title: Summoner 14
description: Gryff has gained a new power and a new shapeshifting wife.But his impromptu vacation is over.When his Mistral friends find him again, they inform him that Varleth is still missing, and the Archon Veopa has awakened in the country of Vay.Now, itâ€™s up to Gryff to search for his friend and hopefully bring peace to the shapeshifting territories.
author: Eric Vall
